title: Scotch Rough Surface Extra Strength Painter's Tape, Green, Tape Protects Surfaces and Removes Easily, Rough Surface Painting Tape for Indoor and Outdoor Use, 0.94 Inches x 60.1 Yards, 1 Roll
description: Scotch Rough Surface Extra Strength Painter's Tape features a very strong adhesive designed for performance on rough, non-damageable surfaces for the protection you need to get the job done. This green tape bonds aggressively to brick, concrete, stucco or rough wood, and it's recommended for use with or on lacquer coatings. Scotch Rough Surface Painters Tape holds strong to interior surfaces for 5 days and exterior surfaces for 3 days while removing easily without leaving any sticky residue behind. Resistant to UV rays, sunlight and moisture, paint tape is an ideal indoor and outdoor tape, letting you conquer wow-worthy painting projects on multiple surfaces. Made from 50% renewable resources with a core made from 70% post-consumer waste, this solvent-free painter tape is made in a zero-landfill site certified for energy management to provide you with a sustainable painting product. To use, apply the painting tape firmly onto the surface and let sit for 30 to 60 minutes before painting. Wait until the paint is dry before removal. With a full range of adhesive solutions, Scotch Brand Painter's Tape delivers confidence in superior results to get the job done right and effectively the first time.
